title: HoP 223 - Straw Men - The Rise of the Universities
itunes:title: HoP 223 - Straw Men - The Rise of the Universities
description: The emergence of universities in Paris, Oxford, Bologna and elsewhere provide the main setting for medieval philosophy in the 13th century and beyond.
content:encoded: The emergence of universities in Paris, Oxford, Bologna and elsewhere provide the main setting for medieval philosophy in the 13th century and beyond.

itunes:summary: The emergence of universities in Paris, Oxford, Bologna and elsewhere provide the main setting for medieval philosophy in the 13th century and beyond.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson
